name: Gun King Demo
description:
First choose from 7 guns. Then level up to mix and match a variety of upgrades to create your very own build.

Survive an endless horde of chess pieces for 10 minutes!

Discover New Builds Every Run

In this bullet heaven survival game, level up to select from unique upgrade trees to mix and match a variety of upgrades to create your very own build.

Select Your Gun

Choose from a variety of guns that offer a variety of gameplay experiences.

Features

  • Over 40 different upgrades too choose from to create your very own build!
  • 7 guns, with more to come post-launch.
  • Gun specific upgrades to vary gameplay / builds.
  • Fast-paced casual 10 minute play session.
